name: comparing
description: Create a comparison function to be used for sorting arrays.

scripts.clean: rimraf index.js index.mjs index.d.ts es coverage
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm test
scripts.build:es: tsc -p . -m es2015 --outDir es && node -e "require('fs').renameSync('es/index.js','index.mjs')" && rimraf es
